name: Wetware
storyline: Enter a world where advanced AI live amongst humans, and play as a Drone Whisperer - a specialist in data extraction from hostile AIs. In a dragged-out war against a rival nation, the Army has captured an enemy drone rife with intel that can help turn the tide to your side. It is your job to extract this information from the drone. The fate of a nation depends on you.
summary: Explore the interplays between AI ethics and consciousness in the shoes of a researcher tasked to hack an enemy drone to win a war.
